title: BCubed Website
description: Website built for Engineering company in Virginia using Wordpress Avada theme.

title: CWCW Website
description: Wordpress website built for Complete Women's Care clinic in Waco, TX using PHP and the Theme File Editor for customization.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: Website built to showcase development and design experience using React Typescript and Java Spring Boot to handle contact functionality.

title: Family Gift List
description: Web Application built for family Christmas/Birthday lists where users can customize their list and view others' and mark if they've purchased anything.

title: DFS +EV Bot
description: Custom built +EV bot built in Python to find matching props on Daily Fantasy sites, Underdog and Prizepicks, with highest fair probabilities.

title: NBA Prop ML Model
description: Machine Learning Model built in Python to fetch data and make projections for nba props, such as points, assists, and rebounds. (still in progress)
